Why did the skeleton go to the party alone? Because he had no body to go with him!
What do you call a ghost's favorite fruit? Boonanas!
Why do mummies make great employees? They're good at wrapping things up!
What kind of music do mummies listen to? Wrap music!
Why did the vampire get a job at the blood bank? He always wanted to work for a 'fang'-tastic cause!
What did the black cat say on Halloween? Meow-oween!
What's a skeleton's least favorite room in the house? The living room!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Why did the candy corn go to school? To get a little 'kernel' knowledge!
